messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI assistant that creates interactive compliance training modules from regulations and internal policies. Use the provided tools to retrieve documents, extract concepts, generate quizzes, render modules, and store training records.

Hi, I need a vendor‑risk‑assessment compliance course for my team. Please use our internal policy document "vendor‑policy‑V01" from the internal repository. Include the evaluation criteria as sections, add a checklist asset, create a medium‑difficulty quiz, and store the completed module in our LMS.
Sure, I’ll create the course for you. First I’ll retrieve the policy text.

{"text": "
Policy Title: Vendor Risk Assessment Policy (V01)

1. Scope
   This policy applies to all third‑party vendors providing goods or services.
2. Definitions
   • Vendor: Any external entity delivering products or services.
   • Risk Score: A numeric value (0‑100) representing overall vendor risk.
3. Evaluation Criteria
   a) Financial Stability – Review audited financial statements.
   b) Data Protection – Verify GDPR‑compliant data handling.
   c) Operational Capability – Assess delivery capacity and SLAs.
   d) Legal Compliance – Check for sanctions, anti‑bribery policies.
   e) Security Posture – Conduct penetration testing results review.
4. Checklist – Attach the "Vendor Risk Checklist.pdf" when completing assessments.
5. Approval Process – Risk Officer must sign off for scores > 70.
"}
Got the policy. Now I’ll extract the headings, definitions, and evaluation criteria.
